about_the_game:
Discover a twisted world in Not Involved: Vermillion

Not Involved. Vermillion is a dark-fantasy story-driven action-adventure game with a craft system.

Embark on a dark-fantasy journey filled with intrigue, danger, and a touch of madness. Immerse yourself in the captivating story of Doctor, a brilliant mind exiled from the prestigious Academy. In this rotten world teeming with hatred and sorrow, your determination and cunning are all you have to rely on.

Key Features



  • DIAGNOSE PATIENTS

    Carefully listen to the patients' desperate pleas, unravel their mysterious ailments, and meticulously record their symptoms in your journal. Every word could hold the key to their salvation.



  • COLLECT INGREDIENTS

    Venture into the treacherous woods, home to vile monsters eager to claim your life. Amidst the looming danger, there's little time to appreciate the beauty of nature. Collect vital ingredients to unlock the secrets of ancient remedies.



  • CRAFT MEDICINES

    Harness your expertise and embark on a series of engaging mini-games to skillfully process each ingredient. Be warned: one wrong move could turn a lifesaving potion into a disastrous concoction.



  • EXPLORE

    Uncover the chilling truth behind the Herbalist's enigmatic disappearance. Delve deep into the haunting unknown as you unravel the dark secrets that haunt these forsaken souls.


Prepare to immerse yourself in the captivating world of Not Involved: Vermillion, where lust for life, cunning, and an unyielding spirit are your only allies. Will you triumph against the odds and reshape the destiny of this twisted realm?

Add Not Involved. Vermillion to your Wishlist now!
